;Being familiar with a surgeon's integrity and character is an important part of research. Information about their qualifications is usually pretty easy to find. Most importantly, experience level should also be a huge consideration. The online world has tons of reliable information about a surgeon's background. In most cases, the information available online will be substantial enough to help you make an informed decision.
;
;Ongoing training is the hallmark of the great cosmetic surgeon. Current and recent training usually signifies that a surgeon is properly evolving with the industry. If the surgeon doesn't have a lot of ongoing training, you may want to think twice about your decision. Having a basic awareness of modern updates is a prerequisite for great plastic surgery. In a sense, you're looking for someone who is a complete perfectionist.
;
;Past successes with the identical procedure you are seeking is imperative. A surgeon who has routinely completed the same procedure successfully is usually someone you can trust. This very important step is often skipped when people have very poor results. Simply by being thorough will you be a lot better off than most people.
;
;Personality is also something that matters in plastic surgery. It's normal to have questions so don't be afraid to voice your concerns. Getting all the necessary concerns out of the way will reduce your stress level significantly. Be clear about your goals for the procedure.
;
